Miscellaneous Highlights: The World Series averaged 9.11 million viewers, less than the 9.79 million average from the 2020 series
Others: The Texas Rangers won their first championship
The five-game series was the least-watched Fall Classic in recorded TV history
The Rangers being the ninth champion since 2013 and 14 teams qualifying for the Fall Classic in the same span has some appeal for Fox executives
The World Series also continues to outperform every entertainment program
